@the_soul wrote:

Just create a variable that saves / loads to the characters’ files by using the savegame() and loadgame() methods.
[/quote]

Way to advanced for people here.

I’ll make a tutorial on it.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,434949.0.html[/quote]

I don’t see how it’s advanced; there are already sample ones you can look at.

for the spellbook is this a good code?

		case 4150: // donator zone
		if(characterdonator >= 1){
			c.triggerTele(2834, 3335, 0);
			break;

? this is in clickingmost.java file.
